Package controller

Class AlbumViewController.AlbumPaneController

java.lang.Object
controller.AlbumViewController.AlbumPaneController
Enclosing class:
AlbumViewController
public static class AlbumViewController.AlbumPaneController extends Object
Main controller of each Album in the Album View.

    Modifier and Type
    Field
